original: Holmberg, Arvid Johan Fredrik, överste, Kalmar, f. 13/3/84 i Skatelöv, Kronob. 1., av Arvid H. o. Sigrid Svensson. G. 27 m. frih:an Eva von Friesendorff. Barn: Bengt f. 28, Ma-lène 30. — Stud:ex. i Lund 04, off :-vol. v. Östg. trängkår 05, off :ex. 07, RS 10-11, intend:ex. 19. Statsstip. f. stud. av mil. motoriser. i tyska riks-värniet 26 O!. brått, armén: 31. Und :löjtn. 07, löjtn. 12, kapt. 22, plac. å Svea trängkår 28, major, i armén 33, major o. chef f. Göta trängkår 34, övilöjtn. 36, överste i armén 39, milrassist. h. länsstyr. i Kalmar 1. sed. 45. Tjg. v. tränginisp. 20-21, regikomm. 22-2l5, chef f. bilkomp. 26-34, lär. v. inf :off :-sk. 28, 30 o. 31, chef f. studikomp. 29-31, ledare f. arméns försök m. gen-gasdr. bilar 28-34. Skr.: Britt, arméns trängorganisation (32), Motorkörin-strukt. f. armén (34). RSO, RVO, FAKSM, RLSFGftjt.
translated: Holmberg, Arvid Johan Fredrik, Colonel, Kalmar, b. 13/3/84 in Skatelöv, Kronoberg County, son of Arvid H. and Sigrid Svensson. Married on 27th to Countess Eva von Friesendorff. Children: Bengt b. 28, Ma-lène b. 30. — High school diploma in Lund 04, enlisted in Östgöta Transport Corps in 05, officer exam in 07, Royal Swedish Staff College education 10-11, intentions exam 19. State scholarship for military motorization studies in the German Reichswehr in 26. Joined army: 31. Second Lieutenant in 1907, Lieutenant in 1912, Captain in 1922, stationed at Svea Transport Corps in 1928, Major in 1933, Major and Chief of Göta Transport Corps in 1934, Lieutenant Colonel in 1936, Colonel in 1939, army representative in the county government of Kalmar since 1945. Served in Transport Training School 1920-1921, regimental commander 1922-1925, Chief of motorized company 1926-1934, instructor at Infantry Officer School in 1928, 1930 and 1931, Chief of study company 1929-1931, leader of army's gas engine vehicle experiments 1928-1934. Authored "Britt, the Army's Transport Organization" in 1932 and "Motor driving instruction for the Army" in 1934. Received honors: Commander of the Royal Swedish Order of the Sword, Commander First Class of the Royal Swedish Order of Vasa, Order of the Cross of Liberty 1st Class, the Finnish Freedom Cross.

awards.name: Royal Swedish Order of the Sword
Order of the Cross of Liberty
